resources.string: Are you using the correct password? Please make sure that your password was entered correctly. Attempt to restore using the recovery phrase if this error persists.
If you create a new test wallet, your existing wallet will be lost unless you backed up you recovery phrase.

This device cannot perform certain cryptographic functions due to software or hardware bugs.
This could be solved with an update from the device manufacturer.

Contact us if you have any questions: support@coinomi.com

This is your recovery phrase, which is used to generate the keys for your wallet. Please write it down on a paper and keep it in a secure place, as you would with paper money. Anyone with access to it has access to the wallet\'s funds.\nIf you lose your recovery phrase, your wallet cannot be recovered.
Touch to generate a new recovery phrase
I have safely stored my recovery phrase
Please make sure that your recovery phrase matches the following:
It is recommended not to skip verification, so that any misspellings could be detected.
Recovery phrase is not valid. Check if some words are misspelled.
Recovery phrase entered does not match your recovery phrase.
Could not verify your recovery phrase. %1$s

This is a test wallet, where you can send and receive testnet Bitcoins, Litecoin and Dogecoins.\n\nIf you want to use the wallet with real money please go to: Settings > Restore wallet > Create a new wallet.
A new version of Coinomi is available, it contains new features and fixes.
Please select the correct coin type
No coins received so far!\n\nYou can get some through an exchange, trading and selling goods or services.
Too many unused addresses, try to use one of the previous addresses before creating a new one.
Could not connect to the coin network
The sending amount is too small and will be rejected by the network
The provided address is not valid.
The provided amount is not valid
Too many decimal places, try less than %1$d
The minimum amount is at least %1$s
Not enough money, current balance is %1$s
Slightly less will be sent because of fees
Set a password to protect your wallet in everyday use.
The BIP39 passphrase locks your recovery phrase and is unchangeable. It is required when restoring your wallet.
WARNING: If you lose your passphrase it will be impossible to restore your wallet!\nPlease proceed only if you know what you are doing.
Password \"%1$s\" is too common to be safely used.
Password is too short, minimum %1$d characters.
Could not proceed, password errors detected.
By not setting a password, your wallet can be accessed without authorization.
To restore your wallet, please provide the same BIP39 passphrase you used when created the protected recovery phrase.\nIf you enter a different passphrase, a new empty wallet will be created.
Please wait while your wallet is being restored
Please wait while your transaction is being prepared and sent.
An error occurred while accessing this wallet account. If the problem persists, try restoring the wallet using the recovery phrase.
The password entered is not valid.
Sent! Please wait for transaction confirmation.
Please confirm this transaction in the next %1$s
Server infrastructure donated by NuBits - The World\'s First Stable Digital Currency\nhttps://nubits.com/

Tamara Castellano (Italian)
Jorge Nicolas Karmis (Spanish)
George Kimionis (Greek)
@visvirial (Japanese)
Денис Рейн (Russian, Ukrainian)
You are about to create a %1$s account in your wallet.
Please wait while creating a new %1$s account
Additional accounts are not yet supported
Select the coins you wish to use with your wallet. You can add more later.
This removes the account from the wallet but it is still possible to re-add it and recover the coins.
Do not automatically create a new address for every transaction
Your recovery phrase is not saved on this device.\nTry restoring your wallet to solve this.
This recovery phrase is protected with a BIP39 passphrase
Select the coins you wish to exchange.\nThe converted coins will be automatically added to your wallet.
Given rate includes ShapeShift.io transaction fee
You will be prompted to add a %1$s wallet
Internet connection is needed to exchange coins.
Service temporary unavailable, please try again in a minute
Service temporary unavailable.\nNo information about %1$s - %2$s pair

An error occurred while signing and broadcasting transaction.

Technical details:

%1$s
The supplied amount exceeds the limit of %1$s. Please use a smaller amount.
The minimum amount is at least %1$s
Your order will complete shortly. You can exit this screen without affecting the exchange.
Transaction not found, try again in a few seconds
Receive an email for this exchange transaction

ShapeShift.io is an instant altcoin exchange that provides Bitcoin and altcoin conversion. The platform (available in both web and API flavors) represents the fastest, most efficient way to convert between Bitcoin and dozens of altcoins within the Bitcoin ecosystem. No account needed.
You can sign or verify a message using an address.
The provided address could not be found in this account.
Sharing your public key will allow anybody to view your balance and transaction history.
The private key allows you to send coins from this account. It is not necessary to backup this key as it is derived from your recovery phrase

You are about to transfer coins from a paper wallet to your Coinomi wallet.
After the transfer is complete, please avoid reusing the paper wallet for security reasons.

Supported formats: WIF, BIP38, Mini private key.
type or scan a private key
Could not recognize the private key format.
The private key type does not match the destination account type.
The private key does not contain any funds.
Please wait while sweeping your paper wallet

LEGAL DISCLAIMER
 
 
 1. Risks related to the use of Coinomi Wallet
 
 Coinomi will not be responsible for any losses, damages or claims arising from events falling within the scope of the following five categories:
 
 (1) Mistakes made by the user of any cryptocurrency-related software or service, e.g., forgotten passwords, payments sent to wrong coin addresses, and accidental deletion of wallets.
 
 (2) Software problems of the wallet and/or any cryptocurrency-related software or service, e.g., corrupted wallet file, incorrectly constructed transactions, unsafe cryptographic libraries, malware affecting the wallet and/or any cryptocurrency-related software or service.
 
 (3) Technical failures in the hardware of the user of any cryptocurrency-related software or service, e.g., data loss due to a faulty or damaged storage device.
 
 (4) Security problems experienced by the user of any cryptocurrency-related software or service, e.g., unauthorized access to users' wallets and/or accounts.
 
 (5) Actions or inactions of third parties and/or events experienced by third parties, e.g., bankruptcy of service providers, information security attacks on service providers, and fraud conducted by third parties.
 
 
 2. Trading and Investment risks
 
 There is considerable exposure to risk in any crypto-currency exchange transaction. Any transaction involving currencies involves risks including, but not limited to, the potential for changing economic conditions that may substantially affect the price or liquidity of a currency. Investments in crypto-currency exchange speculation may also be susceptible to sharp rises and falls as the relevant market values fluctuate. It is for this reason that when speculating in such markets it is advisable to use only risk capital. 
 
 
 3. Electronic Trading Risks
 
 Before you engage in transactions using an electronic system, you should carefully review the rules and regulations of the exchanges offering the system and/or listing the instruments you intend to trade. Online trading has inherent risk due to system response and access times that may vary due to market conditions, system performance, and other factors. You should understand these and additional risks before trading.
 
 
 4. Compliance with tax obligations
 
 The users of the wallet are solely responsible to determinate what, if any, taxes apply to their crypto-currency transactions. The owners of, or contributors to, the wallet are NOT responsible for determining the taxes that apply to crypto-currency transactions.
 
 
 5. No warranties
 
 The wallet is provided on an "as is" basis without any warranties of any kind regarding the wallet and/or any content, data, materials and/or services provided on the wallet.
 
 
 6. Limitation of liability
 
 Unless otherwise required by law, in no event shall the owners of, or contributors to, the wallet be liable for any damages of any kind, including, but not limited to, loss of use, loss of profits, or loss of data arising out of or in any way connected with the use of the wallet. In no way are the owners of, or contributors to, the wallet responsible for the actions, decisions, or other behavior taken or not taken by you in reliance upon the wallet.
 
 
 7. Arbitration
 
 The user of the wallet agrees to arbitrate any dispute arising from or in connection with the wallet or this disclaimer, except for disputes related to copyrights, logos, trademarks, trade names, trade secrets or patents.
 
 
 8. Last amendment
 
 This disclaimer was amended for the last time on January 1st, 2016.
